016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.streams;
017
018import com.eventstore.dbclient.EventStoreDBClient;
019import com.eventstore.dbclient.ResolvedEvent;
020import com.eventstore.dbclient.SubscribeToStreamOptions;
021import com.eventstore.dbclient.SubscriptionListener;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.api.EventStoreMetadata;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.eventstore.resources.EventStoreParameters;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
027import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper;
028import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
031import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
032import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
033import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
034
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.nio.ByteBuffer;
037import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
038
039public class EventStorePublisher
040        implements Publisher<WithMetadata<ByteBuffer>> {
041    private static final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(EventStorePublisher.class);
042
043    private final EventStoreDBClient client;
044    private final ObjectMapper objectMapper;
045    private Configuration publisherConfiguration;
046
047    public EventStorePublisher(EventStoreDBClient client, ObjectMapper objectMapper, Configuration publisherConfiguration) {
048        this.client = client;
049        this.objectMapper = objectMapper;
050        this.publisherConfiguration = publisherConfiguration;
051    }
052
053    @Override
054    public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<ByteBuffer>> subscriber) {
055        new EventsProcessor(subscriber);
056    }
057
058    private class EventsProcessor
059            extends SubscriptionListener
060            implements Subscription {
061
062        private Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<ByteBuffer>> subscriber;
063        private com.eventstore.dbclient.Subscription subscription;
064
065        public EventsProcessor(Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<ByteBuffer>> subscriber) {
066            try {
067                this.subscriber = subscriber;
068
069                EventStoreParameters parameters = objectMapper.treeToValue(publisherConfiguration.json(), EventStoreParameters.class);
070
071                long from = publisherConfiguration.getLong("revision").orElse(parameters.from);
072
073                SubscribeToStreamOptions subscribeToStreamOptions = from == 0 ?
074                        SubscribeToStreamOptions.get().fromStart() :
075                        SubscribeToStreamOptions.get().fromRevision(from);
076                subscription = client.subscribeToStream(parameters.stream, this, subscribeToStreamOptions).get(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS);
077
078                subscriber.onSubscribe(this);
079            } catch (Throwable e) {
080                logger.error("Could not subscribe to EventStore stream", e);
081                subscriber.onError(e);
082            }
083        }
084
085        @Override
086        public void request(long n) {
087            // TODO Semaphore this one ?
088        }
089
090        @Override
091        public void cancel() {
092            subscription.stop();
093            subscriber.onComplete();
094        }
095
096        public void onEvent(com.eventstore.dbclient.Subscription subscription, ResolvedEvent resolvedEvent) {
097            try {
098/*
099                    logger.info(MarkerManager.getMarker(sro.serviceIdentifier().toString()), "Read metadata: " + new String(e.getEvent().getUserMetadata()));
100                    logger.info(MarkerManager.getMarker(sro.serviceIdentifier().toString()), "Read event: " + new String(e.getEvent().getEventData()));
101*/
102
103                Metadata.Builder metadata = new Metadata.Builder((ObjectNode) objectMapper.readTree(resolvedEvent.getEvent().getUserMetadata()));
104
105                // Put in ES metadata
106                new EventStoreMetadata.Builder(metadata)
107                        .streamId(resolvedEvent.getEvent().getStreamId())
108                        .revision(resolvedEvent.getEvent().getRevision())
109                        .contentType(resolvedEvent.getEvent().getContentType());
110
111                subscriber.onNext(new WithMetadata<>(metadata.build(), ByteBuffer.wrap(resolvedEvent.getEvent().getEventData())));
112
113            } catch (IOException ex) {
114                subscription.stop();
115                subscriber.onError(ex);
116            }
117        }
118
119        @Override
120        public void onError(com.eventstore.dbclient.Subscription subscription, Throwable throwable) {
121            subscription.stop();
122            subscriber.onError(throwable);
123        }
124
125        @Override
126        public void onCancelled(com.eventstore.dbclient.Subscription subscription) {
127            subscriber.onComplete();
128        }
129    }
130}
